alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 20 at 1:07PM MST until December 21 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 8 PM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM WEDNESDAY TO 8 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow showers are possible. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch, possibly 3 inches in some locations. Winds gusting as high 40 to 60 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 to 50 below zero. * WHERE...Rock Springs and Green River, Flaming Gorge and East Sweetwater County. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 5 AM to 8 PM MST Wednesday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 11 PM Wednesday to 8 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combinations of strong wind gusts with snow and blowing snow Wednesday will create hazardous conditions across southwest into southern Wyoming, especially those travelling along Interstate 80 and Highway 30.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River
